activities.summary: This activity, CookingAssistantActivity, serves as a full-screen cooking assistant interface. It displays a recipe using a ViewPager2 to navigate between pages or fragments, allows the user to cancel the activity, adjust ingredient scaling via a dialog, and optionally navigate to a support page. The activity supports immersive mode for a distraction-free experience.

activities.summary: This activity, RecipeDetailsActivity, is used to display detailed information about a recipe, including categories, description, directions, and allows actions such as cooking, sharing, editing, deleting, duplicating, and favoriting recipes. It supports PDF generation, collapsing app bar behavior, and manages user interactions with UI components.

activities.summary: This activity is used for creating and editing recipes. It allows users to input or modify recipe details such as title, categories, description, source, servings, time, ingredients, directions, nutrition, and notes. Users can also add or remove an associated image. The activity supports importing recipes from URLs or shared files, handles duplication of existing recipes, and ensures unsaved changes are confirmed before discarding.
